title: Add ralph secrets command for 1Password setup
description: Create ralph-secrets command to configure 1Password integration for project secrets.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add ralph-secrets() function with subcommands: setup, status, migrate
ralph-secrets setup: configure 1Password vault name in config.json
ralph-secrets status: show if 1Password is configured and signed in
Check if op CLI is installed, prompt to install if missing
Verify user is signed into 1Password (op account list)
Store secrets.provider and secrets.vault in config.json
